A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is BY FAR the worst Start Wars movie ever made. Filled with stupid one-liners\, empty mediocre story and shallow characters. The political statements were poorly presented and made this already horrible experience worse. There is not a single thing i can think of about this movie that I enjoyed. As a Star Wars fan I feel extremely sad and with no hope for the third installment of the franchise\nTL\,DR you sit there for 2 1/2 hours  going through one shitty emotional plot hole to the next with shitty action scenes and mediocre acting. ALL THE CRITICS RAVING ABOUT THIS MOVIE ARE PAID...
